name: Daniel Rivero
content: Daniel Rivero Cebrián File. Department Computer Science and Information Technologies Knowledgment area Computational Science and Artificial Intelligence Research Research group Redes de Neuronas Artificiales y Sistemas Adaptativos - Imagen Médica y Diagnóstico Radiológico Research lines Procesado de señales e imágenes mediante técnicas de Aprendizaje Máquina Keywords Redes de Neuronas Artificiales, Aprendizaje Máquina, Computación Evolutiva Teaching merits evaluation 3 five years period(s) Research merits evaluation 3 six years period(s) Contacto UDC directory Orcid id0000-0001-8245-3094 Scopus6603716776 One of the data sources for my teaching/research is the Alpha Vantage Stock API (https://www.alphavantage.co/). The data repository is among the global financial data sources in the machine learning and quantitative finance domains (https://medium.com/@patrick.collins_58673/stock-api-landscape-5c6e054ee631 ).
